issue.title: [C++] Provide public API for constructing IPC message headers like RecordBatch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3500](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3500). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful to be able to construct a Flatbuffers message via a public API rather than having to use Flatbuffers directly
